alert.note: Alert for Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 2:15PM EST until January 20 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 10 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of two to four inches with locally higher amounts near five inches along western facing slopes. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...In Maryland, Garrett County. In West Virginia, Western Grant and Western Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 10 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The gusty winds could result in blowing snow. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The higher snow accumulations will be along western facing ridges. In Garrett County, MD the higher accumulations will be west of a line from Grantsville to Bittinger to Swanton, with lesser amounts in the eastern portion of the county.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
